snippet: A Chinese company plans to demolish a century-old mining village to make way for an enormous copper mine, but many residents have resisted, staging marches and other protests.
abstract: Chinese mining company Chinalco plans to demolish century-old mining village of Morococha, Peru, to make way for enormous copper mine, but many residents have resisted, staging marches and other protests; replacement town is being built six miles away to relocate more than 5,000 residents.
lead_paragraph: A Chinese company plans to demolish a century-old mining village to make way for an enormous copper mine, but many residents have resisted, staging marches and other protests.

headline.seo: Hundreds in Peru Balk at Relocating From Copper Mine Site
headline.main: Hundreds in Peru Balk at Relocation From Site of Mine
headline.print_headline: Hundreds in Peru Balk at Relocation From Site of Mine
